mapper.select: SELECT VACNO, ID, START_DAY, END_DAY, HALF, GETSU, BIGO FROM VACATION v WHERE ID = '2403110901' AND TO_CHAR(START_DAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN '2024-02-01' AND LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('2024-02-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')) ORDER BY START_DAY

SELECT E.ID , E.NAME , E.JOIN_DAY , D.DNAME , E.SPOT , E.LEAVE , SUM(NVL(CASE WHEN V.START_DAY >= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') || '-' || TO_CHAR(E.JOIN_DAY, 'MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND V.START_DAY <= TO_DATE('2024-03-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN V.GETSU ELSE 0 END, 0)) Used_Leave, E.LEAVE - SUM(NVL(CASE WHEN V.START_DAY >= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') || '-' || TO_CHAR(E.JOIN_DAY, 'MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND V.START_DAY <= TO_DATE('2024-03-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN V.GETSU ELSE 0 END, 0)) Remaining_Leave FROM EMPLOYEE E INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPTNO = D.DEPTNO LEFT JOIN VACATION V ON E.ID = V.ID GROUP BY E.ID, E.NAME, E.JOIN_DAY, D.DNAME, E.SPOT, E.LEAVE

SELECT E.ID , E.NAME , E.JOIN_DAY , E.LEAVE , SUM(NVL(CASE WHEN V.START_DAY >= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') || '-' || TO_CHAR(E.JOIN_DAY, 'MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND V.START_DAY <= TO_DATE('2024-03-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN V.GETSU ELSE 0 END, 0)) AS Used_Leave, E.LEAVE - SUM(NVL(CASE WHEN V.START_DAY >= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') || '-' || TO_CHAR(E.JOIN_DAY, 'MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND V.START_DAY <= TO_DATE('2024-03-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN V.GETSU ELSE 0 END, 0)) AS Remaining_Leave FROM EMPLOYEE E LEFT JOIN VACATION V ON E.ID = V.ID WHERE E.ID = '2303100101' GROUP BY E.ID, E.NAME, E.JOIN_DAY, E.LEAVE
